people_also_ask.heading: Why is it called High Tech? The word 'high' in the term 'high tech' refers to the higher level of investment and resources required to manufacture products with higher order technological features. This means a product that uses advanced technologies is more expensive and more difficult to get access to.14-Feb-2021
